channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- JTTK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- JTTK

item.title: CVE-2022-41851|2024-08-03T12:56:38.099Z -- siemens -- jttk
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in JTTK (All versions < V11.1.1.0), Simcenter Femap V2022.1 (All versions < V2022.1.3), Simcenter Femap V2022.2 (All versions < V2022.2.2). The JTTK library is vulnerable to an uninitialized pointer reference vulnerability while parsing specially crafted JT files. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process. (ZDI-CAN-16973)
